plot: With Homer's help, Flanders tries to establish a Christian theme park based on drawings in Maude's sketch book.

Ned opens a theme park to the memory of his late wife Maude and it becomes a huge success when people kneeling in front of a statue of Maude experience mystic visions. The reason for this is that a grille in front of the statue is an out-pipe for a propane gas line and they are getting high on the gas. Unfortunately the park is closed down when Homer and Ned try to stop two children from lighting a candle before the altar and are charged with assault.Ned does,however,enjoy the further company of Rachel Jordan,despite his efforts to turn her into a clone of Maude.—don @ minifie-1
